targets.rawSql: select monthly_cost from current_bill_tou where meter_id = 8;
select total_energy from energy_per_month where meter_id = 8;
select estimated_monthly_bill, estimated_total_energy from estimated_tou_cost where meter_id = 8;

SELECT
	SUM(total_energy) AS total_energy,
	date_trunc('hour', window_end) AS month
FROM energy_per_house
GROUP BY meter_id, date_trunc('hour', window_end)
HAVING meter_id = 8;

panels.title: Live Energy Usage Patterns for Meter 8

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	SUM(total_energy) AS total_energy,
	date_trunc('hour', window_end) AS hour
FROM energy_per_house
GROUP BY date_trunc('hour', window_end);

SELECT
	SUM(total_energy) AS total_energy,
	date_trunc('hour', window_end) AS hour
FROM energy_per_house
GROUP BY date_trunc('hour', window_end)
ORDER BY hour desc LIMIT 1;

SELECT
	SUM(total_energy) AS total_energy,
	date_trunc('day', window_end) AS day
FROM energy_per_house
GROUP BY date_trunc('day', window_end)
ORDER BY day desc LIMIT 1;

SELECT
	SUM(total_energy) AS total_energy,
	date_trunc('day', window_end) AS day
FROM energy_per_house
GROUP BY date_trunc('day', window_end);
select max(month) as current_month, sum(total_energy) FROM energy_per_month GROUP BY month order by month desc limit 1;

WITH household AS(
SELECT
	meter_id,
	sum(total_energy) AS total_energy,
	date_trunc('day', window_end) AS day
FROM energy_per_house
GROUP BY meter_id, date_trunc('day', window_end))
SELECT avg(total_energy), day from household
group by day

WITH household AS(
SELECT
	meter_id,
	sum(total_energy) AS total_energy,
	date_trunc('hour', window_end) AS hour
FROM energy_per_house
GROUP BY meter_id, date_trunc('hour', window_end))
SELECT avg(total_energy), hour from household
group by hour;

select customers.meter_id,
       address,
       current_bill,
       total_energy AS current_energy_consumed,
       estimated_total_bill,
       estimated_total_energy,
       energy_per_month.month
       from current_bill_tiered
join customers on current_bill_tiered.meter_id = customers.meter_id
join energy_per_month on current_bill_tiered.meter_id = energy_per_month.meter_id and 
  current_bill_tiered.month = energy_per_month.month and current_bill_tiered.year = energy_per_month.year
join estimated_tier_cost on current_bill_tiered.meter_id = estimated_tier_cost.meter_id and
  current_bill_tiered.month = estimated_tier_cost.month
where energy_per_month.month = (select max(date_trunc('month', window_end)) from energy_per_house)
order by month desc, meter_id

select customers.meter_id,
       address,
       monthly_cost as current_bill,
       total_energy AS current_energy_consumed,
       estimated_monthly_bill,
       estimated_total_energy as estimated_monthly_energy,
       energy_per_month.month from current_bill_tou
join customers on current_bill_tou.meter_id = customers.meter_id
join energy_per_month on current_bill_tou.meter_id = energy_per_month.meter_id and 
  current_bill_tou.month = energy_per_month.month and current_bill_tou.year = energy_per_month.year
join estimated_tou_cost on current_bill_tou.meter_id = estimated_tou_cost.meter_id and current_bill_tou.month = estimated_tou_cost.month
where current_bill_tou.month = (select max(date_trunc('month', window_end)) from energy_per_house)
order by month desc, meter_id;
